source: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_SEQ_00<tab>Lord Haurchefant needs your help to clear Lord Francel's name.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_SEQ_00<tab>キャンプ・ドラゴンヘッドのオルシュファンは異端審問を阻止したいようだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_SEQ_01<tab>With Lord Francel's trial close at hand, Lord Haurchefant bids you inform the inquisitors of your findings and petition them on behalf of House Fortemps to postpone the trial indefinitely. Relay Lord Haurchefant's words to Inquisitor Brigie at Camp Dragonhead.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_SEQ_01<tab>濡れ衣で弾劾されるフランセルの異端審問を止めるため、外にいる審問官「ブリギ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_SEQ_02<tab>Inquisitor Brigie informs you that Inquisitor Guillaime is already overseeing Lord Francel's trial at Witchdrop, and that it is impossible to call a halt to proceedings. Inform Lord Haurchefant of this development.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_SEQ_02<tab>ブリギから話を聞いた。異端審問は間もなく始まってしまうらしい。「オルシュファン」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_SEQ_03<tab>Refusing to abandon Lord Francel to his fate, Lord Haurchefant bids you rendezvous with one of his knights at Witchdrop, and do whatever is necessary to prevent Lord Francel from coming to harm. With Ser Hourlinet's aid, protect Lord Francel until Lord Haurchefant arrives.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_SEQ_03<tab>オルシュファンに報告した。審問の行われる「ウィッチドロップ」に向かい、「ウルリネ」と話して異端審問を止めよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_SEQ_04<tab>Inquisitor Guillaime ignores your pleas and instead commands his knights to slay you then and there. Even Lord Haurchefant is unable to convince the inquisitor to yield─until you reveal that one of the Temple Knights was a heretic in disguise. Forced to acknowledge that there is merit to Lord Haurchefant's claims of a conspiracy, Inquisitor Guillaime agrees to withdraw his charges and departs─though not before reminding you to stay focused on your search for the <var 1A 02 /var>Enterprise<var 1A 01 /var>. Now that Lord Francel's good name has been redeemed, return to Camp Dragonhead and ask Lord Haurchefant to summon his reluctant witness.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_SEQ_04<tab>異端審問は中止となり、フランセルの潔白が証明された。キャンプ・ドラゴンヘッドへ戻って「オルシュファン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_SEQ_05<tab>Lord Haurchefant thanks you for saving the young lordling's life, and indeed his own, at Witchdrop. Like you, he is eager to return to the matter of the <var 1A 02 /var>Enterprise<var 1A 01 /var>, and none too soon...
target: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_SEQ_05<tab>冒険者の活躍で、アインハルト家の異端騒動は一応の決着をみた。飛空艇についても、情報が入ってきたようだ。

target: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_SEQ_06<tab>

target: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_TODO_00<tab>ブリギと話す

target: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_TODO_01<tab>オルシュファンに相談

source: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_HAURCHEFANT_000_000<tab>From the very first, I <var 1A 02 /var>knew<var 1A 01 /var> it could not be that so many members of House Haillenarte were heretics. At last, we can give the lie to these poisonous allegations, and put an end to this travesty!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_HAURCHEFANT_000_000長らく我々を翻弄してきた異端問題も、
お前のおかげで、カタをつけられそうだ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_HAURCHEFANT_000_001<tab>I will need to prepare a formal statement regarding these developments for the Holy See. In the meantime, I would have you bear my words to Inquisitor Brigie. Tell her that House Fortemps asks─nay, <var 1A 02 /var>demands<var 1A 01 /var> that Lord Francel's trial be postponed until a full investigation has been conducted!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_HAURCHEFANT_000_001アインハルト家が陥れられたことを伝え、
フランセルへの異端審問を止めよう。
お前は、外にいる審問官「ブリギ」に報告してくれ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_BRIGIE_000_010<tab>What is it, my child? Hm? Lord Haurchefant would have the inquisitors do what?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_BRIGIE_000_010フランセル卿の異端審問を止めたい？
オルシュファン卿ったら、相変わらず激しいお方……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_BRIGIE_000_011<tab>But that is not possible. Inquisitor Guillaime presides over Lord Francel's trial at Witchdrop even as we speak.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_BRIGIE_000_011残念ながら、先ほど異端審問官のギイェーム様が
フランセル卿をお迎えにあがりましたわ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_BRIGIE_000_012<tab>Fear not: if Lord Francel is indeed innocent, he shall walk in Halone's halls with the fallen heroes of Ishgard.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_BRIGIE_000_012間もなく、ウィッチドロップで異端審問がはじまる……。
オルシュファン卿にも、
友の潔白を祈って待つようお伝えください。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_HAURCHEFANT_000_020<tab>They have taken Lord Francel to <var 1A 02 /var>Witchdrop<var 1A 01 /var>!? This is madness! The inquisitor does not have sufficient grounds to subject him to that manner of trial!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_HAURCHEFANT_000_020フランセルの異端審問が始まるだと！？
潔白を祈れとは白々しい……。
あれは、審問とは名ばかりの処刑ではないか！

source: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_HAURCHEFANT_000_021<tab>I will not stand idly by and allow an innocent man to die. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I would dispatch you and one of my knights to Witchdrop to forestall the proceedings until such time as I am able to join you and petition Inquisitor Guillaime in person. I will endeavor not to keep you waiting too long.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_HAURCHEFANT_000_021だが、今ならまだ止められる。
私は急ぎ、部下を送る手はずを整える。
お前も支度を整えて「ウィッチドロップ」へ向かってくれ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_HAURCHEFANT_000_022<tab>Do whatever you must to keep Lord Francel alive!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_HAURCHEFANT_000_022私もすぐに合流しよう！
……異端審問官ギイェームめ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_HOURLINET_000_030<tab>Hail, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. As you can see, Lord Francel yet lives. We must try to reason with the inquisitor─but if his guards judge us a threat, we must also be prepared to defend ourselves.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_HOURLINET_000_030お前だけでも間に合って幸いだ。
審問官殿は護衛の神殿騎士を連れている……
万が一のことになれば、俺だけでは心許ない。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_GUILLAIME_000_040<tab>Joacin Charlemend Francel de Haillenarte─you stand accused of heresy against the Holy See of Ishgard. Is there aught you wish to say in your defense?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_GUILLAIME_000_040汝、フランセル・アインハルト。
戦神ハルオーネの御名において、審問をはじめます。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_FRANCEL_000_041<tab>Hear me, brothers─these charges are false! The men and women of my line have ever opposed the Dravanians, and I am no different! Since the very birth of our nation, we have gladly shed blood in service to the Holy See! Condemn me and you will strike a blow for the enemies of Ishgard!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_FRANCEL_000_041言ったはずだ、私は異端者ではない……！
建国よりドラゴン族との戦いに鉄血を捧げてきた、
アインハルト家の名誉にかけて！

source: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_GUILLAIME_000_042<tab>It is for Halone to judge if you speak the truth.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_GUILLAIME_000_042<tab>その名誉が問われているのですよ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_GUILLAIME_000_043<tab>Prove your innocence in the eyes of gods and men. Leap from the cliff and entrust your fate to the Fury.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_GUILLAIME_000_043四大名家に連なる者なら、ご存知でしょう？
潔白を証明するには……ただ、飛べばいい。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_GUILLAIME_000_044<tab>The righteous shall take their place in Halone's halls, while the wicked shall reveal their drachen forms and be put to the sword!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_GUILLAIME_000_044貴方が無実の徒であるならば、魂は神に救われましょう。
ですが、もしもドラゴン族の眷属と化した異端者であり、
悪しき翼によって、谷底から舞い戻ったときは……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_HOURLINET_000_045<tab>In the name of House Fortemps, I beseech you─stay your hand!
target: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_HOURLINET_000_045<tab>お待ちを、どうか武器をお収めください！

source: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_HOURLINET_000_046<tab>Inquisitor, we are come on behalf of Lord Haurchefant. My lord has uncovered evidence which suggests that the charges against Lord Francel are without merit.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_HOURLINET_000_046ギイェーム審問官殿。
今回の異端の嫌疑について、オルシュファン隊長は
何者かの悪しき企みがあると危惧しています。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_HOURLINET_000_047<tab>We humbly request that these proceedings be suspended until such time as a full reexamination of the facts has been conducted.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_HOURLINET_000_047<tab>審問を中止し、どうか隊長の訴えをお聞きいただきたい！

source: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_GUILLAIME_000_048<tab>Lord Haurchefant has allowed his personal relationship with the accused to cloud his judgment. That he should harbor private doubts, I might have allowed...but that he would <var 1A 02 /var>dare<var 1A 01 /var> interfere in legal proceedings sanctioned by the Holy See, I cannot.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_GUILLAIME_000_048フォルタン家の……。
昔なじみと聞いていましたが、愚かな選択をしたものです。
名家の騎士として、何と嘆かわしい。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_GUILLAIME_000_049<tab>To defy the will of an inquisitor is to commit heresy! A crime for which there is but one punishment!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_GUILLAIME_000_049正義は、神の御手によってのみ測られる！
その邪魔立てをすることは、神への冒涜と心得なさい。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_HOURLINET_000_050<tab>We must hold them until Lord Haurchefant arrives, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! And remember─no harm can come to the inquisitor!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_HOURLINET_000_050審問官殿を傷つけるわけにはいかない。
隊長が到着するまで、周りの騎士をおさえるぞ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_HAURCHEFANT_000_060<tab>It is not our intention to defy the will of the archbishop.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_HAURCHEFANT_000_060ギイェーム審問官殿……
我々は、教皇のご意思に背くつもりはありません。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_HAURCHEFANT_000_061<tab>But this trial─like many others, I fear─has been orchestrated by enemies of House Haillenarte. They have used you and your fellows to sow discord, Inquisitor─to set brother against brother, that we may tear ourselves apart.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_HAURCHEFANT_000_061ただ、この審問は間違っている。
神の騎士として、神聖なる審問が汚されることを
見逃すわけにはいかないのです。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_GUILLAIME_000_062<tab>...The fevered imaginings of a desperate man. What proof have you of this?
target: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_GUILLAIME_000_062<tab>我々が過ちを犯していると……？

source: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_HAURCHEFANT_000_063<tab>By the Fury...a draconian rosary! Then the knight who refused to yield─it was <var 1A 02 /var>he<var 1A 01 /var> who summoned the wyvern!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_HAURCHEFANT_000_063「竜眼の祈鎖」だと……！？
これが、神殿騎士の懐から見つかったというのか！

source: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_GUILLAIME_000_064<tab>A heretic in the ranks of the Temple Knights. This has grave implications...
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_GUILLAIME_000_064なんですって？
どうして私の騎兵たちが、異端者の証を……！？

source: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_GUILLAIME_000_065<tab>Your claims...would appear to have merit, Lord Haurchefant. I shall withdraw my charges against Lord Francel, pending further investigation.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_GUILLAIME_000_065……オルシュファン卿、
あなたの言葉には一理あるようです。
私は急ぎ帰還し、真実を知らねばならないようだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_GUILLAIME_000_066<tab>I trust you have not lost sight of that which first brought you to Coerthas, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Pray locate your errant airship...and use it.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_GUILLAIME_000_066今回の件は不問としますが……冒険者よ。
占星台での忠告を、今一度、心に刻んでおくように。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_FRANCEL_000_067<tab>Lord Haurchefant, I have not the words to express my gratitude. But why would you risk your reputation to save mine?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_FRANCEL_000_067オルシュファン、)) (( )) 02 /var>……。
なんと礼を言ったらいいか……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_HAURCHEFANT_000_068<tab>Because I know you, boy. You're too loyal to betray Ishgard, and too devout to question your sentence. Had we been any slower, you'd have jumped of your own free will.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_HAURCHEFANT_000_068敬虔なお前のことだ。
ためらいなく飛び降りるのではないかと、焦ったぞ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_FRANCEL_000_069<tab>I...I would have done whatever it took to redeem House Haillenarte.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_FRANCEL_000_069汚名が雪（すす）げるのならそうしたさ。
だが……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_HAURCHEFANT_000_070<tab>Praise Halone it did not come to that. But it profits us little to dwell on what might have been.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_HAURCHEFANT_000_070ああ、ともかくキャンプ・ドラゴンヘッドへ戻ろう。
恩人を雪の中に立たせておくのは忍びない。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_HAURCHEFANT_000_071<tab>Let us quit this place, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Pray visit me at Camp Dragonhead once you have recuperated.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_HAURCHEFANT_000_071)) (( )) 02 /var>、
キャンプに戻り、落ち着いたら私を訪ねてくれ。
今回の働きに、誠意をもって応えたい。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_HAURCHEFANT_000_080<tab>You look well, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. May I say what a pleasure it was to fight alongside such a fearless and skillful warrior.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_HAURCHEFANT_000_080戻ったか、ふふ……
いや、お前の戦いぶりを思い出していてな。
実にたぎる共闘だった……あの熱気……すごくイイ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_HAURCHEFANT_000_081<tab>Were it not for you, Lord Francel would surely have died defending the honor of his house─and I might well have perished at the hands of a heretic and his wyvern.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_HAURCHEFANT_000_081ゆっくりと語らいたいところだが、まずは礼だな。
感謝するぞ、)) (( )) 02 /var>……
お前がいなければ、私はかけがえのない友を失くしていた。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_HAURCHEFANT_000_082<tab>House Fortemps and House Haillenarte shall never forget your service. Now, let us return to the matter of your missing <var 1A 02 /var>Enterprise<var 1A 01 /var>!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_HAURCHEFANT_000_082これでは、どちらが助けるほうやら。
私にできる精一杯の謝礼として、伝令を走らせておいたぞ。
さあ、待ちに待った飛空艇情報の到着だ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_QIB_TODO001<tab>Defeat Inquisitor Guillaime's guards!
target: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_QIB_TODO001<tab>異端審問官の護衛を倒せ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_QIB_TODO002<tab>Pick up Alderique's rosary.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_QIB_TODO002<tab>竜眼の祈鎖を拾う

source: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_HOURLINET_BATTLETALK_01<tab>Your shield bears no sigil, ser! Do you serve the Holy See or one of the High Houses?
target: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_HOURLINET_BATTLETALK_01<tab>紋章のない盾……貴様、どこの騎兵だ？

source: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_ALDERIQUE_BATTLETALK_02<tab>I serve a <var 1A 02 /var>higher<var 1A 01 /var> power!
target: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_ALDERIQUE_BATTLETALK_02<tab>……フン、お前が知るべきことではない。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_HOURLINET_BATTLETALK_03<tab>Look, look! Lord Haurchefant is come!
target: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_HOURLINET_BATTLETALK_03<tab>あれは……きたぞ、オルシュファン様だ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_HAURCHEFANT_BATTLETALK_04<tab>In the name of House Fortemps, I demand that you lay down your arms!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_HAURCHEFANT_BATTLETALK_04待たせたな。
ひとまずこの場を収めるぞ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_GUILLAIME_BATTLETALK_05<tab>By this deed, you do disgrace your line, Lord Haurchefant!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_GUILLAIME_BATTLETALK_05フォルタン家の騎士……。
自ら家名を汚しに来ましたか。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_HAURCHEFANT_BATTLETALK_07<tab>A wyvern!? But there were no reports of Dravanian activity!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_HAURCHEFANT_BATTLETALK_07ドラゴンだと！？
馬鹿な、周辺の警備は万全のはず！

source: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_GUILLAIME_BATTLETALK_08<tab>You would call upon your allies to save you!? At last, your treachery is laid bare!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_GUILLAIME_BATTLETALK_08異端を助けにきたのでしょう。
やはり、罪は明白なようだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_ALDERIQUE_BATTLETALK_10<tab>This...this will not be forgotten...
target: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_ALDERIQUE_BATTLETALK_10<tab>この恨み、我が同胞が……必ず……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_HAURCHEFANT_BATTLETALK_11<tab>Ugh... It cannot end this way...it mustn't...
target: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_HAURCHEFANT_BATTLETALK_11<tab>無念……もはや真実は……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_FRIEND_GAIUSB803_BATTLETALK_12<tab>Forgive my weakness...
target: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_FRIEND_GAIUSB803_BATTLETALK_12<tab>力及ばず……申し訳ありません……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_FRIEND_GAIUSB803_BATTLETALK_13<tab>Ishgardian scum! Today you shall answer for your sins!
target: TEXT_GAIUSB803_00912_FRIEND_GAIUSB803_BATTLETALK_13<tab>チッ、こうなったら……。
